Pre-Game Insights: India starts the ODI series as a heavy favourite with a star-studded squad against Sri Lanka.
The Indian batting boasts some world-class players like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Shubhman Gill and others who have been in incredible form in the 50-over format.
Mohammed Siraj will spearhead the attack alongside Kuldeep Yadav, who could dominate in the Lankan spin-friendly conditions.
The Lankan batting will be in for a tough challenge and the likes of Pathum Nissanka, Kusal Mendis, Sadeera Samarawickrama and Charith Asalanka will be crucial for the teamâ€™s chances.
Maheesh Theekshana and Matheesha Pathirana will be the biggest threats for India while Dunith Wellalage will look to repeat his heroics from the Asia Cup 2023 against the Men in Blue.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ODI series will be played at the R.Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.
All three One-Days will be played at the R.Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.
Charith Asalanka will kick-start his ODI captaincy after a disappointing T20I series where the Lankans suffered three consecutive defeats.
